short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stellar Tip makes it super easy to send and receive tips using the Stellar Network.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
To receive tips, you must add your Stellar address to your YouTube channel description or Twitch/GitHub bio.

Currently supports YouTube, Twitch, and GitHub.

For more info, check out https://galactictalk.org/d/2327-stellar-tip-tipping-for-content-creators-and-developers
